players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Alice, she seems suspicious."
You: "Bob was the mafioso, and I killed him last night. Diana is innocent."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso and Diana killed him last night."
